price: Hakika walio wafitini Waumini wanaume na Waumini wanawake, kisha hawakutubu, basi watapata adhabu ya Jahannamu na watapata adhabu ya kuungua.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
footnotes: Hakika walio watia matatani Waumini wanaume na Waumini wanawake kwa maudhi na kuwaadhibu kwa moto, kisha wasitubu na kurejea nyuma watapata Akhera adhabu ya Jahannamu kwa ukafiri wao, na watapata adhabu ya kuunguzwa kwa kule kuwaunguza moto Waumini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna fatanū al-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti thumma lam yatūbū falahum ʿadhābu jahannama walahum ʿadhābu al-ḥarīqi
